thread.title: N0m0reg0dz

author: N0m0reg0dz
title: N0m0reg0dz
text:
I learned about the website from a friend, we were discussing about
Playing BG EE online, so i had to buy the game again. He showed me the website, i had a quick look online for opinions and did not waste any time, i bought the complete saga with 75% off. The cd keys arrived immediately, i logged in to steam and that was it! Plain and simple! Great website!
